name: Nazi Labs
description:
Nazi Labs is a twin-stick top-down action rogue-like game with a random level generator and cumulative power- ups, art and sprites based on the golden age of arcade games with many references to all sci- fi / nerd-universe , comics and classic arcade games with dark theme focused on Nazi secrets and legends.

You can choose from several prisoners of war and try to escape from an underground nazi laboratory, go through the floors of bizarre experiences and destroy the nazi enemy and win the war to save humanity.

FEATURES

  • Procedural random level generator.
  • Random power ups.
  • 3/4 perspective with 8 ways movement animations.
  • Unlockable characters.
  • Bullet time , zoom and slow motions to increase the satisfaction of playing.
  • Adrenaline and Intense Gameplay.
  • Different endings for each playable character.
